article_text:
Instead of reforming a broken system, Obamacare put the status quo on steroids, further entrenching the unholy alliance between big government and corporate America

To truly reform the system, we should make Americans responsible for covering their own health care expenses up to 15-20 percent of their annual adjusted gross income

While making health care completely portable, it would almost eliminate the need for private insurance
